title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: OER Utilization Strategies for Higher Education Administrators

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Students can comparatively analyze the educational effectiveness and cost-saving aspects of OERs.
Students can propose three or more OER evaluation criteria reflecting the characteristics of mathematics curricula.
Students can design case-based OER utilization strategies suitable for mobile environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
